_readme: The contents of this file are used to generate CHANGELOG.md; It's kept in JSON/parsable format to make it
possible to generate change-logs in other formats as well (when needed) and to do automatic releases based on
added change-log records. More on how to use it: https://github.com/vaimo/composer-changelogs

fix: wrong kind of extraction pattern provided for version poller (sscanf pattern used but code behind the scenes was expecting RegEx)
bad unescaped path configured for browser binary for Windows which resulted in version polling not working

breaking: (code) started to rely on external general-issue library for most of the implementation; only configuration remains in this package
feature: support for browser version detection added for Windows
detect installed browser version when possible (when Firefox installed)
